name: kmake
description: build tool for c++ projects (node js based)

scripts.dev-mac: npm i && npx nodemon --ignore examples/* source/index.js examples/cpp xcodeMac examples/cpp/out --useInputCache 1 --define TEST_DEF=1 --define TEST_DEF3 --define TEST_DEF4=TEST_DEF --lib OpenAL.framework --libPath /System/Library/Frameworks/
scripts.dev-mac-build: npm i && npx nodemon --ignore examples/* source/index.js examples/cpp xcodeMac examples/cpp/out --useInputCache 1 --build 1 --define TEST_DEF=1 --define TEST_DEF3 --define TEST_DEF4=TEST_DEF
scripts.dev-vs: npm i && npx nodemon --ignore examples/* source/index.js examples/cpp vs2019 examples/cpp/out --useInputCache 1 --define TEST_DEF=1 --define TEST_DEF3 --define TEST_DEF4=TEST_DEF
scripts.dev-mk: npm i && npx nodemon --ignore examples/* source/index.js examples/cpp makefile examples/cpp/out --useInputCache 1 --define TEST_DEF=1 --define TEST_DEF3 --define TEST_DEF4=TEST_DEF
scripts.test-dev: npm i && npx nodemon --ignore examples/* source/tests.js
